snippet.title: Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven, the full 3D remake of a fan-favorite Romancing SaGa 2, is coming to Nintendo Switch, PS5, PS4 and Steam on October 24, 2024.  

Romancing SaGa 2, the hit RPG that sold more than 1 million copies upon its 1993 release in Japan, was praised by many for its challenge, nonlinear exploration, and deep and unique gameplay mechanics. 

Revisit the history of the Varennes Empire in the first modern 3D remake of this groundbreaking title and defeat the Seven Heroes - once beloved saviors of humankind, now fallen and seeking vengeance on all who wronged them. 

With Japanese and English voiceovers, an enhanced turn-based battle system, and both the original and rearranged compositions by the legendary Kenji Ito (known for his work on the SaGa franchise, notably SaGa Frontier and the Mana series), it's your chance to choose the next ruler and expand the Empire across multiple generations, engaging in a battle that spans over millennia.

Save Your Empire. Defend Your Legacy.

Pre-order now on all available platforms with pre-orders for the digital Nintendo Switch available at a later date.
